text: FC Lausanneâ€“Sport (also referred to as LS) is a Swiss football club based in Lausanne in the canton of Vaud. It was founded in 1896. They play in the Swiss Super League. The team has won seven league titles and the Swiss Cup nine times. ==References== Category:1896 establishments in Switzerland Category:Swiss football clubs Category:Organizations based in Lausanne
title: FC Lausanne-Sport
